Gigan thought he could withstand Oblitertron's blasts and let them hit him. 
Of course he fell back hard on his butt from the blast. But gets back up with 
alittle pain in his stomach where he was hit. Now he would be ready for 
Oblitertron's attacks.
Growling, he raised his missile launcher once again and fired two missiles at 
Oblitertron's legs.
nbwrpg@egroups.com wrote:
>
> Oblitertron:
> 
> 
> 
> Oblitertron saw the incoming missile, heading for his head. �He fired an 
> optic blast which intercepted the missile, sending it to the Pit (well, not 
> really) before it even came with in ten feet of him.
> 
> "FOOL! �PREPARE TO BE OBLITERATED!"
> 
> He raised his laser rifle, firing off two blasts at Gigan.
> 
> (Please take in the proportions here, Oblitertron is 45 feet tall, so his 
> rifle would have to match his height, so the rifle would be bigger than a 
> regular one, and the laser bolts would match the size of the rifle) 
>
